channel.title: Rules/Reporting
channel.description:
In ToS everyone says report someone for the smallest things most I am not enough sure you can report for such a thing.
I was hoping at some point in the game's development you would a section in game so everyone could view the rules and know what they can all be banned for and what people can't be as well

item.title: Rules/Reporting
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
FadeBlade:

can’t be as well

No full-stop after “well”. Reported.

Read full topic

item.title: Rules/Reporting
item.dc:creator: Romeo
item.description:
Would love to have this. It’s good to have the rules easily accessible. In ToS it was rare for people to show signs they have ever read the rules.

Read full topic
